projects.title: Launch a Youth Advocacy Campaign
projects.description: Design and execute a social media campaign that mobilizes young voters around a local political issue using ethical AI tools.

lessons.title: Identifying Your Cause
lessons.description: Learn how to research and select a meaningful political issue that resonates with your community.

lessons.title: Crafting Your Message with AI
lessons.description: Use AI tools ethically to refine your campaign messaging while maintaining authenticity.

lessons.title: Building Your Digital Strategy
lessons.description: Create a comprehensive social media plan targeting youth audiences.

lessons.title: Measuring Impact & Engagement
lessons.description: Track your campaign's reach and learn to interpret analytics responsibly.

outcomes: Create a complete campaign strategy document
Launch at least 5 posts across platforms

projects.title: Deepfake Detection Workshop
projects.description: Master the skills to identify AI-generated political content and become a trusted source of information in your community.

lessons.title: What Are Deepfakes?
lessons.description: Understand the technology behind AI-generated media and its political implications.

lessons.title: Spotting the Signs
lessons.description: Learn visual and audio cues that reveal manipulated content.

lessons.title: Verification Tools & Techniques
lessons.description: Use professional fact-checking methods and AI detection tools.

lessons.title: Teaching Others
lessons.description: Create educational materials to help your peers identify misinformation.

outcomes: Create a guide for your school/community

projects.title: Build a Civic Engagement Chatbot
projects.description: Design and deploy an AI chatbot that helps young people understand local elections, voting rights, and civic participation.

lessons.title: Civic Information Research
lessons.description: Gather accurate, non-partisan information about local governance and elections.

lessons.title: Conversational Design Basics
lessons.description: Learn how to structure chatbot conversations that are helpful and unbiased.

lessons.title: Building Your Bot
lessons.description: Use no-code AI tools to create your civic engagement chatbot.

lessons.title: Testing for Bias
lessons.description: Evaluate your chatbot for political bias and accuracy.

lessons.title: Launch & Gather Feedback
lessons.description: Deploy your chatbot and iterate based on user responses.

projects.title: Political Ad Analysis Project
projects.description: Investigate how AI is used in political advertising and create transparency reports for your community.

lessons.title: The Political Ad Landscape
lessons.description: Understand how political ads are targeted, funded, and distributed.

lessons.title: AI in Political Targeting
lessons.description: Learn how algorithms decide who sees which political messages.

lessons.title: Building Your Analysis Framework
lessons.description: Create a systematic method for evaluating political ads.

lessons.title: Creating Your Report
lessons.description: Compile your findings into an accessible transparency report.

projects.title: Community Voice Amplifier
projects.description: Use AI tools to gather, analyze, and amplify underrepresented voices in your local political conversations.

lessons.title: Identifying Marginalized Voices
lessons.description: Research which communities are underrepresented in local politics.

lessons.title: Ethical Interview Techniques
lessons.description: Learn to conduct respectful, meaningful community interviews.

lessons.title: AI-Assisted Story Compilation
lessons.description: Use AI to help organize and present community narratives.

lessons.title: Platform Strategy
lessons.description: Choose the right channels to share community stories effectively.

lessons.title: Measuring Community Impact
lessons.description: Track how your amplification efforts create real change.

projects.title: Draft an AI Policy Proposal
projects.description: Research, write, and present a proposal for ethical AI use in government to your local representatives.

lessons.title: AI Policy Landscape
lessons.description: Survey existing AI policies at local, state, and federal levels.

lessons.title: Stakeholder Mapping
lessons.description: Identify who is affected by AI policy decisions.

lessons.title: Writing Your Proposal
lessons.description: Structure a compelling, evidence-based policy recommendation.

lessons.title: Building Coalition Support
lessons.description: Gather endorsements and feedback from community leaders.

lessons.title: Presentation Skills
lessons.description: Prepare to present your proposal to officials.
